data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Shoephone is encrypted communication tunnel between servers, hence
    the IO root level. Shoephone communication can be a crossplatform
    method for monitoring, management, or any distributed computing.
    There will be a set of 5 perl modules, used for security, client &
    server functionality, job dispatching, and log processing. Although
    Shoephone uses the SOAP module, it differs because the SOAP
    communication protocol is transparent, only used as a multiplatform
    base communication. The name "Shoephone" is descriptive of it's
    function. Like the shoe phone in the Get Smart television show, it
    is a means for secure communication. We will make a Shoephone Bundle
    upon completion.
